column5: Step back into yesterday in this old Victorian that has been beautifully updated. Home boasts 5 bedrooms, 3 bathrooms, formal dining room, library, wrap around porch and gardens. 10 minutes to Baylor Scott and White Memorial Hospital, McLane Children's Hospital.Ideal for resident or traveling nurse with monthly discount.   Entire house also available for 2 nights or more, will sleep 14-16 comfortably. Perfect for large family gatherings, bridal or baby shower, contact host for more information.
